tasks.label: Extract 2023 7z
tasks.command: /Users/sebastiandrazsky/Panargus-isi/.venv/bin/python -c "import py7zr, time; from pathlib import Path; d=Path('/Users/sebastiandrazsky/Panargus-isi/data/raw/comext_bulk/extracted/2023'); d.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True); t=time.time(); py7zr.SevenZipFile('/Users/sebastiandrazsky/Panargus-isi/data/raw/comext_bulk/full_v2_202352.7z','r').__enter__().extractall(path=d); print(f'Done in {time.time()-t:.0f}s')"
